extendedInfo.description: GREAT URBAN ESCAPES THE INSIDERâS GUIDE TO THE WORLDâS GREAT CITIES Escape the ordinary, the familiar and the normal this summer by ditching the package holiday, sun cream and loungers and heading instead for some of the worldâs most intoxicating cities: London, Paris, Dublin and New York. Celebrating the independent spirit of todayâs discerning traveller, the Jameson Great Urban Escapes limited edition app tells you the places a local would recommend to visit, and discover the real heart of these sensational cities

reviews.title: BRENDAN BEHAN\'S URBAN ESCAPE
reviews.comment: He liked the taste of whiskey And Irish whiskey too. He could empty half of Bantry Bay And nevermore feel blue. From a distillery o\'er in Limerick Or from some reeky Dublin tap It put his melancholy day On the well-established map. He headed toward Dublin to procure Another flask of Ireland\'s best Just as punchy Just as sure And just as good as all the rest. THE POET\'S ELIXIR: IRISH WHISKEY!! FROM JAMES MICHAEL CHAPESKIE
reviews.author: James Chapeskie
